text: Ila Elisha nakamlonjela, â€œNdaze, muhe wa heni hauwele hamwe na hegwe mhela yula munhu loyaduliche kulawa kuli mutuka wa heye leka yakubochele? Ndaze, awu ndo mhela wa kubochela sendi ama mivalo ama migunda ja mizeituni ama ja mizabibu ama ming'holo ama misenga ama vitumagwa walume ama wadala?
